mdRecord.dcterms:title: Untitled [New Room]
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ingersoll, T. W. (Truman Ward), 1862-1922 (possibly)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cabinet card of interior view of the new room in the Mansion at Mount Vernon. View towards southwest corner includes Rembrandt Peale portrait of Washington Before Yorktown, Houdon bust of Washington and furnishings. A brass railing surrounds the fireplace and Vaughan mantel. A penciled note on the reverse of the cardboard mount reads: Presented by Free Library of Phila. February 1938. See file Misc. Accessions. Their date "early 1890s"
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p New Room
